label: Martyrologion: Martyrdom of Partiklos of Caesarea, Follower of Pamphilos

work.desc_title: Martyrdom of Partiklos of Caesarea, Follower of Pamphilos

note.value: Earliest attestation of this text in CPA. It is only known from a list as Baṭrīqlāwus (Arabic) and Patrikila (Georgian) in Sinai Georgian 34; see Sauget, pp. 316-317

Bibliography: J.-M. Sauget, Premières recherches sur l’origine et les charactéristiques des synaxaires melkites (XIe-XVIIe siècles), Subsidia Hagiographica 45 (Brussels, 1969), pp. 316-317 ; Desreumaux 2010, p. 1322, fig. 2 (photo of f. 5v) ; Müller-Kessler 2018a, pp. 63-71
